entry.title: Blink Comparison
entry.content:
Das Konzept der "Blink Comparison"-Methode ist einfach - die App erm√∂glicht es, zwischen zwei Fotos eines gleichen Objekt schnell und ohne Verz√∂gerung zu wechseln, um eventuelle Unterschiede einfacherer zu erkennen.
;
;Die Methode der "Blink Comparison" nutzt die hocheffiziente Mustererkennung des menschlichen Auges, um eine schnelle √úberpr√ºfung zwischen einem Referenzbild und einem tats√§chlich vor Ort aufgenommenen Bild zu erm√∂glichen. Zum Beispiel zur Erkennung von Manipulationen an kontrastreichen Siegeln aus Nagellack, die zur Sicherung von Manipulationen verwendet werden.
;
;üìã Merkmale
;* Freie und quelloffene Software (FOSS)
;* Unterst√ºtzung mehrerer Plattformen und Ger√§te (derzeit nur Android)
;* Hinzuf√ºgen und Speichern von Referenzbildern in der App oder Aufnahme von Bildern vor Ort; alle Bilder sind verschl√ºsselt, so dass sie nur schwer gestohlen oder ersetzt werden k√∂nnen
;* Vergleichen Sie das Referenzbild mit dem Bild, das Sie gerade aufgenommen haben, indem Sie die Methode der "Blink Comparison" anwenden.
;* Hilft dabei, ein Vergleichsfoto in der richtigen Position, mit dem richtigen Winkel, der richtigen Beleuchtung und Entfernung aufzunehmen.
;* Material Design
;* Nachtmodus
;* Responsive UI f√ºr verschiedene Ger√§teformate
;
;Weitere Informationen finden Sie hier: ;https://github.com/proninyaroslav/blink-comparison/blob/HEAD/README.md;
;Datenschutzerkl√§rung: ;https://github.com/proninyaroslav/blink-comparison/blob/HEAD/PRIVACY.md;
;
entry.summary: Simplifies comparing photos of tamper-evident seals using your eyes

entry.title: Chaka Book Reader
entry.content:
Chaka is an Android app based on MuPDF Android Viewer. It doesn't care about books management. but dedicates to book reading experience, with most expected features:
;Horizontal / Vertical Flipping.
;Right-to-Left Forward reading mode, for some reverse reading direction books.
;Single Column mode, to work with Scanned Dual-Spread PDF documents.
;Cropping Margin, to get more visible reading area.
;Focus mode.
;
entry.summary: An excellent Android book reader based on MuPDF Android Viewer

entry.title: Fossify Camera
entry.content:
Fossify Camera is your go-to app for capturing life‚Äôs moments with precision and privacy. Whether you‚Äôre snapping photos or recording videos, this fully customizable, privacy-respecting camera app is designed to meet your needs.
;
;
;;üì∏ YOUR PRIVACY, OUR PRIORITY:;
;
;With the Fossify Camera app, your data remains private. Enjoy a camera that works without internet access or intrusive permissions, ensuring your photos and videos stay secure.
;
;
;;üöÄ SEAMLESS PERFORMANCE:;
;
;Fossify Camera provides a fluid and responsive interface. Switch between photo and video modes, adjust zoom, and toggle between front and rear cameras instantly. Capture moments with zero lag and experience smooth performance at all times.
;
;
;;üñºÔ∏è COMPLETE CUSTOMIZATION:;
;
;Personalize every aspect of your camera experience. Adjust the output quality, customize the save path, and set the resolution to suit your needs. You can even customize colors and themes to match your style.
;
;
;;‚ö° DYNAMIC CONTROLS:;
;
;Toggle settings with ease‚Äîcontrol flash, aspect ratio, and zoom directly from the camera view. The app is designed for quick access, letting you capture moments efficiently, with intuitive controls.
;
;
;;üñºÔ∏è MATERIAL DESIGN:;
;
;Enjoy a sleek, user-friendly interface with material design and a dynamic theme that adapts to your preferences. Whether you're using the app during the day or at night, Fossify Camera provides a smooth and intuitive experience.
;
;
;;üåê OPEN-SOURCE ASSURANCE:;
;
;Fossify Camera is built on an open-source foundation. With our commitment to transparency, you can review the code on GitHub and be part of a community that values privacy and trust.
;
;
;Fossify Camera offers everything you need to capture moments effortlessly while respecting your privacy.
;
;
;Explore more Fossify apps: https://www.fossify.org
;
;Open-Source Code: https://www.github.com/FossifyOrg
;
;Join the community on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Fossify
;
;Connect on Telegram: https://t.me/Fossify
;
;
entry.summary: Lightweight open-source camera app for quick, easy, and secure photography

entry.title: RomanDigital
entry.content:
The RomanDigital app provides a clock of unique style that can be used to repurpose an old device or to display time on a current model.
;
;For more personal use, the RomanDigital widget makes a distinctive addition to a device's Home screen.
;
;RomanDigital includes features expected in an ordinary digital clock app, such as:
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Choice of 12 or 24 hour format
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Optional AM/PM indicator (uniquely integrated into the time display)
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Option to keep display on when app is in the foreground
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Display in either portrait or landscape
    • ;
    ;
;
;
;For more detailed information including a FAQ list, please see the README.md file accompanying the RomanDigital source code.
;
;Source code for RomanDigital is available at:
;https://github.com/dfyockey/RomanDigital
entry.summary: Digital Clock App and Widget with Roman Numeral Display

entry.title: Micro REPL
entry.content:
Micro REPL has the following features:
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;A ;Terminal; to access MicroPython interactive interpreter.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Files ;Explorer; (Files Manager) for MicroPython storage.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;A Smart ;Code Editor; with python syntax support and code completion.
    • ;
    ;
;
;
entry.summary: MicroPython IDE

entry.title: Dahdidahdit
entry.content:
;
;Ham radio ops who like QRP will sooner or later want to learn Morse code so they
;can communicate using CW. This app teaches not only amateur radio enthusiasts
;how Morse code works and trains practitioners so they get faster.
;
;

;
;You set your current level of proficiency and what you aim for (e.g. all letters
;with 20 words per minute). Dahdidahdit guides you from where you are to where
;to want to be: it teaches you new letters when you are ready and increases your
;speed when you seem bored. The only things you need other than a phone and the
;app is a sheet of paper and a pen. When you start the session, Dahdidahdit
;plays Morse code letters you know at the speed you are comfortable with. You jot
;down the letters you recognized. When the session ends, Dahdidahdit shows you
;what it sent and you compare notes. Then you tap the button that shows the
;proper number of mistakes. When you complete enough practice sessions with only
;few mistakes, Dahdidahdit starts the next lesson - be it by introducing a new
;letter or by increasing the speed.
;
;

;
;Other features include learning Q-code and sending practice using either an
;on-screen or an actual paddle, connected by USB.
;
entry.summary: An actual Morse code trainer, not just a Morse code generator

entry.title: Fossify Launcher
entry.content:
Fossify Launcher is your gateway to a fast, personalized, and privacy-first home screen experience. No ads, no bloat ‚Äì just a smooth, efficient launcher designed to fit your unique style and preferences.
;
;
;;üöÄ LIGHTNING-FAST NAVIGATION:;
;
;Navigate your device with speed and precision. Fossify Launcher is optimized to be responsive and fluid, giving you instant access to your favorite apps without lag.
;
;
;;üé® FULL CUSTOMIZATION:;
;
;Tailor your home screen with dynamic themes, custom colors, and layouts. Personalize your launcher to match your style with easy-to-use tools that let you create a truly unique setup.
;
;
;;üñºÔ∏è COMPLETE WIDGET SUPPORT:;
;
;Integrate fully resizable widgets with ease. Whether you need clocks, calendars, or other handy tools, Fossify Launcher ensures they blend seamlessly into your home screen design.
;
;
;;üì± NO UNWANTED CLUTTER:;
;
;Effortlessly manage your apps by hiding or uninstalling them in just a few taps, keeping your home screen organized and clutter-free.
;
;
;;üîí PRIVACY AND SECURITY:;
;
;Your privacy is at the heart of Fossify Launcher. With no internet access and no intrusive permissions, your data stays with you. No tracking, no ads ‚Äì just a launcher built to respect your privacy.
;
;
;;üåê OPEN-SOURCE ASSURANCE:;
;
;Fossify Launcher is built on an open-source foundation, allowing you to review our code on GitHub, fostering trust and a community committed to privacy.
;
;
;Find your balance of speed, customization, and privacy with Fossify Launcher.
;
;
;Explore more Fossify apps: https://www.fossify.org
;
;Open-Source Code: https://www.github.com/FossifyOrg
;
;Join the community on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Fossify
;
;Connect on Telegram: https://t.me/Fossify
;
;
entry.summary: Customize your home screen with a fast, ad-free, open-source launcher

entry.title: Railway station photos
entry.content:
Mit der Bahnhofsfotos-App kannst Du das OpenData Projekt https://railway-Stations.org unterst√ºtzen. W√§hle ein Land und finde Bahnh√∂fe zu denen wir noch kein Bahnhofsfoto auf http://www.deutschlands-bahnhoefe.de / https://railway-stations.org haben. Inzwischen sind √ºber 20 L√§nder in unserer Datenbank. Weitere werden St√ºck f√ºr St√ºck hinzugef√ºgt.
;
;Im Men√ºpunkt "Deine Daten" gibst Du an, wie Du die Fotos schicken m√∂chtest - als verlinkter Fotograf oder anonym, mit Lizenz ohne Namensnennung und ob Du das Foto selbst geknipst hast. Wenn Du verlinkt werden m√∂chtest, ben√∂tigen wir den Link und den Nicknamen zu z.B. Deinem Twitter-Account.
;Wenn Du einen Token anforderst, kannst Du Deine Fotos auch hochladen.
;
;Mittles Klick auf das Suchsymbol oben im Startbildschirm, kannst Du eine Volltextsuche ausl√∂sen.
;
;Im Men√ºpunkt "Bahnhofskarte" kannst Du Deinen Standord ermitteln und Bahnh√∂fe in der N√§he finden. Es l√§sst sich filtern, ob Du nur Bahnh√∂fe mit oder ohne Foto sehen m√∂chtest.
;
;Melde inaktive oder fehlende Bahnh√∂fe √ºber die App.
;
;Du kannst auch ausw√§hlen, ob Du benachrichtigt werden m√∂chtest, wenn sich ein Bahnhof in unmittelbarer N√§he befindet.
entry.summary: Collect photos of railway stations for https://railway-stations.org

entry.title: PeakOrama
entry.content:
PeakOrama zeigt die Berggipfel rund um einen Standort mithilfe der PeakFinder-API.
;Der Standort kann entweder √ºber die Photon-API oder √ºber das GPS Ihres Ger√§ts gesucht werden.
;Die Ansicht kann manuell auf dem Bildschirm gedreht werden oder basierend auf dem eingebauten Kompass Ihres Ger√§ts oder √ºber die Bewegungsrichtung.
;Falls Ihr Kompass auch nach der Kalibrierung eine Abweichung aufweist, besteht die M√∂glichkeit, die Abweichung zu korrigieren.
;Das Setzen von Markierungen wird nicht unterst√ºtzt.
;
;F√ºr die Nutzung dieser App ist eine funktionierende Internetverbindung erforderlich.
;F√ºr jeden Standort werden etwa 5-10 MB Daten heruntergeladen. Achten Sie also auf Ihren Datenverbrauch.
entry.summary: PeakOrama shows mountains around a location

entry.title: Electrum Bitcoin Wallet
entry.content:
Electrum Bitcoin wallet for Android.
;
;Secure, feature rich and trusted by the Bitcoin community since 2011.
;‚Ä¢ Website: https://electrum.org
;‚Ä¢ Email: electrumdev@gmail.com
;‚Ä¢ GitHub: https://github.com/spesmilo/electrum
;‚Ä¢ Support: Please use GitHub or email to report bugs rather than the app rating system.
;
;Features:
;‚Ä¢ Safe: Your private keys are encrypted and never leave your device.
;‚Ä¢ Forgiving: Your wallet can be recovered from a secret phrase.
;‚Ä¢ Instant On: Electrum uses servers that index the Bitcoin blockchain making it fast.
;‚Ä¢ No Lock-In: You can export your private keys and use them in other Bitcoin clients.
;‚Ä¢ No Downtimes: Electrum servers are decentralized and redundant. Your wallet is never down.
;‚Ä¢ Proof Checking: Electrum Wallet verifies all the transactions in your history using SPV.
;‚Ä¢ Cold Storage: Keep your private keys offline and go online with a watching-only wallet.
;
entry.summary: Fast and self-custodial wallet for Bitcoin and the Lightning Network

entry.title: gpsdRelay
entry.content:
This app allows you to utilize an Android device's GPS chip as a gpsd location data provider. UDP or TCP transport protocols are supported for supplying NMEA messages to the daemon.
;
entry.summary: Relay NMEA information from Android to gpsd.

entry.title: DSub2000
entry.content:
Connect to your Subsonic server and listen to your music wherever you go. Songs
;are cached for playback to save on your mobile bandwidth and to make them
;available when you have no connection at all.
;
;Subsonic is a cross-platform FOSS media server that's capable of indexing very
;large media collections. The server can transcode if necessary so that the app
;can play files that your device may not normally support.
;
;

;Features

;
;
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Drag and drop songs to rearrange your playlist on the Now Playing tab
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Pause playback when other apps request audio focus (navigation, etc)
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Lockscreen controls
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Gapless Playback
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Highly customizable UI
    • ;
    ;
  • ;User defined Cache Size, Network Timeout, and Buffer Length
    • ;
    ;
;
entry.summary: Android client for Subsonic servers.

entry.title: Tuta Calendar
entry.content:
Take your privacy to the next level with the secure Tuta Calendar app. This encrypted time-management tool is the most private way to organize your busy schedule ‚Äì and it‚Äôs quick to navigate, comes with dark and light mode, plus, it‚Äôs perfectly integrated with the Tuta Mail app.
;
;
;SECURE CALENDAR
;
;* Quantum-safe encryption: End-to-end encrypted data exchange with all Tuta Calendar users and with users of other calendar apps (via optional password-protected event invites).
;* No ads, no tracking, and no data sharing: We protect your privacy.
;* Zero-knowledge architecture: Entire events, including event notifications, are encrypted and hidden from our servers. We do not know when your meetings are taking place, who they are with, or what they are about.
;* Based in Germany: All data is safeguarded by strict German data protection laws.
;* Fully GDPR-compliant
;
;FULLY FEATURED
;
;* **SYNC ON ALL DEVICES:** Your Tuta planner syncs automatically on all devices and browsers.
;* **RECURRING EVENTS:** Use daily, weekly, monthly, yearly or custom repetitions.
;* **MULTIPLE CALENDAR VIEWS:** Switch in one tap between agenda, daily, weekly, and monthly view.
;* **SYNC EXTERNAL CALENDARS:** Events will automatically sync if the owner adds or updates events or meetings on external calendars. Once subscribed, no action is needed.
;* **MANAGE UNLIMITED CALENDARS (paid feature):** You can toggle different calendars into view with a single press or leave all events visible for a complete overview.
;* **EVENT REMINDERS:** Never miss a date. Tuta‚Äôs zero-knowledge reminders make sure you never miss an appointment.
;* **LINK CALENDAR EVENTS TO EMAILS AND CONTACTS:** Your Tuta Calendar is directly linked to your Tuta Mail account, so when creating events you can easily invite your contacts or send invites to others via email.
;* **OFFLINE SUPPORT:** Independent standalone app so you can check your schedule both online and offline!
entry.summary: Quantum-safe encrypted planner to schedule & manage your events & sync calendars

entry.title: Mancala
entry.content: Mancala is a traditional board game that involves strategy, counting, and some luck. This implementation of Mancala is developed for Android, allowing players to enjoy the game on their mobile devices. For the command-line interface (CLI) implementation, see https://github.com/Willie169/mancala-cli.
entry.summary: Mancala Game

entry.title: unjumble
entry.content:
Unjumble all 4364 words using the pictures as a hint.
;
entry.summary: an anagram game with picture hints

entry.title: Fitness Calendar
entry.content:
## Features
;
;- Track activities of all kinds
;- Activity recording
;- Gpx import
;- Create custom activity types
;- Statistics
;- Basic diary functionality
entry.summary: A private and fully offline activity tracker.

entry.title: Sensa Gram
entry.content:
Transform your Android device into a dynamic sensor hub with Sensagram, offering seamless real-time data streaming. Sensagram allows you to seamlessly stream live sensor data over UDP, ensuring low latency
;
;Effortlessly broadcast a wide range of Android sensors, including motion, position, environmental, and GPS (location) data, directly to a specified IP address or server, making it the perfect tool for developers, researchers, and tech enthusiasts.
;
;Key Features:
;
;Real-time Streaming: Transmit sensor data in real time for accurate and immediate feedback.
;Comprehensive Sensor Support: Stream data from motion (gyroscope, accelerometer), position (magnetic field, rotation vector), environmental (light, temperature), and GPS (location) sensors.
;Low Latency with UDP: Experience the speed and efficiency of UDP, providing minimal delay in data transmission, ideal for time-sensitive applications.
;Customizable Endpoints: Easily configure and send data to your desired IP address or network endpoint.
;
;In the app, select the desired sensors from the list and tap the "Stream" button. This will begin transmitting sensor data to the specified address. To receive the data, you'll need to set up a UDP server. The app sends the data in JSON format.
;
;For complete guidance please visit https://github.com/umer0586/SensaGram
;
entry.summary: Stream Android sensor data over UDP with minimal latency.

entry.title: Bibleside
entry.content:
A simple, offline Bible app featuring the Open English Translation: a new, open-licensed Bible translation.
;
;The OET (Open English Translation) is a new, open-licensed Bible translation (currently in draft state) featuring multiple versions intended to be used together. Please see the OET website (https://openenglishtranslation.bible) for more information on what makes it different than other translations.
;
;
;FEATURES
;- Contains the OET Reader's version, OET literal version, and the KJV version.
;- Read Bible versions together with linked scrolling.
;- Adjust text size and switch between light, dark, sepia, and high contrast themes.
;
;Bibleside is currently in alpha, with more features and improvements planned. Feedback is welcome!
entry.summary: Offline Bible app featuring the OET (Open English Translation)

entry.title: BinEd - Binary/Hex Editor
entry.content:
BinEd is a hex editor tool, which allows to directly browse and edit content of any file or binary data.
;
;App is currently beta with limited functionality.
;
;Features
;--------
;
;- Visualize data as numerical (hexadecimal) codes and text representation
;- Codes can be also binary, octal or decimal
;- Support for Unicode, UTF-8 and other charsets
;- Insert and overwrite edit modes
;- TODO: Searching for text / hexadecimal code with matching highlighting
;- Support for undo/redo
;- TODO: Support for files with size up to exabytes
;
;Translations
;------------
;
;- Hindi: Govind S Nair
;
;
entry.summary: Editor for binary data (hex viewer/editor)

entry.content:
Welcome to FetchIt! Easily download media from your favorite platforms and save it to your device. üé•üì∏

entry.title: DroidCrypt
entry.content:
Description:
;
;File and text encryption in Android offers crucial benefits in protecting sensitive data. By encrypting files and text, users can prevent unauthorized access, ensuring confidentiality and privacy. This is especially vital in a world where mobile devices often contain personal, financial, and business-related information. Encryption adds an additional layer of security, preventing malicious actors from intercepting or tampering with data, thus mitigating the risk of data breaches and identity theft.
;
;Features:
;
; - Uses AES-256-GCM for encryption
;
; - Uses Scrypt for key derivation with CPU/Memory cost of 32768, block size of 16, and parallelization of 4
;
; - Built in Java
;
entry.summary: A file and text encryption tool for Android

entry.title: Compose Stopwatch
entry.content:
Android-Stoppuhr-App im Material You-Design, entwickelt f√ºr einfache Bedienung und beste Funktionen
;
;‚ñ∫ Kreisf√∂rtiger Fortschritt
; ‚Ä¢ Zeigt den Fortschritt der aktuellen Runde basierend auf der allerersten an
; ‚Ä¢ Ein Strich auf dem Rundenfortschritt zeigt die vorherige Runde an
;
;‚ñ∫ Thema √§ndern, neue Themen verf√ºgbar
; ‚Ä¢ Dynamisches Thema ist nur ab Android 12+ verf√ºgbar
; ‚Ä¢ Extra Dunkel-Thema spart Akku bei AMOLED-Bildschirmen
;
;‚ñ∫ Ausrichtung √§ndern
; ‚Ä¢ Portr√§tmodus bietet mehr Platz f√ºr Runden
; ‚Ä¢ Im Querformat ist der Zeittext gr√∂√üer
;
;‚ñ∫ W√§hlen Sie eine Aktion aus, wenn Sie auf die Zeit anzeigende Uhr tippen
; ‚Ä¢ Fortsetzen oder Pause
; ‚Ä¢ Fortsetzen oder Runde hinzuf√ºgen
; ‚Ä¢ Fortsetzen oder Stopp
; ‚Ä¢ Wenn Sie dies nicht m√∂chten, k√∂nnen Sie die Aktion entfernen
;
;‚ñ∫ Benachrichtigungen ein-/ausschalten
; ‚Ä¢ Stoppuhr-Steuerung in Benachrichtigungen
; ‚Ä¢ Bei Deaktivierung arbeitet die Stoppuhr mit ViewModel und DataStore
; ‚Ä¢ Bei Aktivierung arbeitet die Stoppuhr mit LifecycleService und ForegroundService
;
;‚ñ∫ Bildschirm-Wachmodus
; ‚Ä¢ M√∂glichkeit, die Stoppuhr zu beobachten, ohne dass der Bildschirm in den Ruhezustand geht
entry.summary: Stopwatch in the Material You theme, designed for ease of use and best features

entry.title: Seers Lodge
entry.content:
Seers Lodge is a feature-rich chat application that runs on the Tox protocol.
;This app is designed to be a modern, decentralized alternative to mainstream chat apps without sacrificing the features "we all know and love".
;
;"Features? What kind?"
;- Decentralized P2P calling and messaging
;- Peer-to-peer file sharing üëÆüèø
;- Role-based group chat
;- Custom avatars
;- Message reactions üëç
;- Text effects and styles
;- Animated emojis and GIFs
;- Embedded URL previews
;- Voicemail!
;
;And much more to come!
entry.summary: P2P Chat Application

entry.title: RetroDrawing
entry.content: A drawing app with low resolution and a fixed 32 color palette. Has various tool: small, medium and large pen, fill bucket, color picker, full undo support etc.
entry.summary: A simple drawing app with big pixels and fixed palette.

entry.title: Aer - Fork of Anemo
entry.content:
Aer is a private local (+secondary) storage utility application for android.
;
;Do you worry about your private pictures or files appearing in other apps?
;That's where Aer private storage comes in. Files in Aer storage won't appear in the other apps.
;
;Instead of being a stand-alone file manager user interface, it hooks into various components of
;Android making it feel like a native part of the operative system.
;Moreover it provides ways for the user to export contents from other apps and save them as files.
;
;Features
;
;- Create folders and organize files freely
;- All files in the private storage won't appear in the other apps
;- Access in the system Files application (the _DocumentsProviderUI_)
; - An optional shortcut for devices that do not expose the system Files app is offered
;- Lock access to the private storage
; - Quick tile
; - Auto lock after 15 minutes
; - Password for locking access to the files
;- Import content using the share Android functionality
;
;Aer vs Anemo
;
;In addition to Anemo features above, Aer adds support for external storage, like encrypted SD cards.
;When available Aer will store your files on external storage (which tend to have larger capacity).
;This also allows accessing your private files on your computer when connected using USB (MTP).
;The storage backend used is also manually configurable.
;
entry.summary: Private storage utility for android with support for external storage media

entry.title: Emotic
entry.content:
;A simple app which lists a bunch of emoticons (not emojis!).;
;
;Features:
;
    ;
    ;
  • ;Browse through a list of emoticons which you can copy to clipboard
    ;without using internet or any websites.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Add or modify your own emoticons.
    • ;
    ;
  • ;Search using related tags.
    • ;
    ;
;
;
;App is written in Flutter, using Material 3 and supports dark/light mode.
;
entry.summary: Reignite the love for emoticons

entry.title: Qalculate!
entry.content:
Qalculate! - the ultimate multi-purpose calculator - is now finally available on Android!
;
;It is simple to use but provides power and versatility normally reserved for complicated math packages, as well as useful tools for everyday needs (such as currency conversion and percent calculation). Features include a large library of customizable functions, unit calculations and conversion, physical constants, symbolic calculations (including integrals and equations), arbitrary precision, uncertainty propagation or interval arithmetic.
entry.summary: Powerful and versatile multi-purpose calculator
